stingwing_matriarch.name: Stingwing Matriarch
stingwing_matriarch.desc: Giant wasp queen ruling the skies.

death_weaver.name: Death Weaver
death_weaver.desc: Master weaver of lethal trap webs.

drift_jelly.name: Drift Jelly
drift_jelly.desc: Small jellyfish drifting on air currents.

tidal_jelly.name: Tidal Jelly
tidal_jelly.desc: Large jelly pulling in prey with tidal force.

tidal_jelly_monarch.name: Tidal Jelly Monarch
tidal_jelly_monarch.desc: Enormous jelly monarch ruling the tidal pools.

deep_jelly.name: Deep Jelly
deep_jelly.desc: Deep-dwelling jelly adapted to crushing pressure.

blood_stalker.name: Blood Stalker
blood_stalker.desc: Predator drawn to the scent of blood.

pack_howler_alpha.name: Pack Howler Alpha
pack_howler_alpha.desc: Alpha predator commanding the hunting pack.

phantom_stalker.name: Phantom Stalker
phantom_stalker.desc: Semi-transparent predator fading in and out.

doom_stalker.name: Doom Stalker
doom_stalker.desc: Herald of destruction prowling the wastes.

apex_stalker.name: Apex Stalker
apex_stalker.desc: Ultimate predator at the top of the food chain.

obsidian_golem.name: Obsidian Golem
obsidian_golem.desc: Volcanic glass golem of deadly sharpness.

void_sentinel.name: Void Sentinel
void_sentinel.desc: Ancient guardian of the void boundary.

oblivion_wraith.name: Oblivion Wraith
oblivion_wraith.desc: Wraith from the edge of oblivion itself.

omega_mass.name: Omega Mass
omega_mass.desc: Final form of dark energy evolution.

crystal_colossus.name: Crystal Colossus
crystal_colossus.desc: Enormous crystalline titan guarding ancient secrets.

blight_eye.name: Blight Eye
blight_eye.desc: Eye spreading corruption with its gaze.

void_eye.name: Void Eye
void_eye.desc: Eye peering from the void itself.

godseye.name: God's Eye
godseye.desc: Eye of a being beyond comprehension.

the_formless_one.name: The Formless One
the_formless_one.desc: Entity of pure unreality, a living paradox.

abyss_lurker.name: Abyss Lurker
abyss_lurker.desc: First creature encountered in the abyss.

deep_shade.name: Deep Shade
deep_shade.desc: Shadow given form in the deep.

abyssal_leviathan.name: Abyssal Leviathan
abyssal_leviathan.desc: Massive serpent ruling the upper abyss.

abyss_maw.name: Abyss Maw
abyss_maw.desc: All mouth and hunger from the deep.

void_kraken.name: Void Kraken
void_kraken.desc: Multi-tentacled terror of the void depths.

elder_serpent.name: Elder Serpent
elder_serpent.desc: Ancient serpent of immense size and wisdom.

cosmic_warden.name: Cosmic Warden
cosmic_warden.desc: Warden of the cosmic barrier between realms.

void_knight.name: Void Knight
void_knight.desc: Knight sworn to serve the void.

the_primordial.name: The Primordial
the_primordial.desc: Being from before the dawn of creation.

entropy_incarnate.name: Entropy Incarnate
entropy_incarnate.desc: The living embodiment of entropy itself.
